title: Snappy Driver Installer R461 [EN-MULTI] Uploaded by MonstersBugl
description:
Snappy Driver Installer R461 [EN-MULTI] Uploaded by MonstersBugle
 
http://extraimago.com/image/aomZ

Software version: SDI R461 from 04.07.2016 / DP 16065 of 05/07/2016
Official website: sdi-tool.org
Developers: SamLab (drayverpaki), BadPointer (program).
Language: Russian, English and 25 more languages.

Treatment: not required

System requirements:
Windows 2000 | XP | Vista | 7 | 8 | 8.1 | 10
Description:
Snappy Driver Installer (SDI) - a portable software to install and update drivers and does not require an internet connection. It is a leader among the programs of this class matching accuracy and speed drivers. When ranking the driver gives priority to a more appropriate drivers (regardless of the availability of newer versions), to minimize the risks to ordinary users. Specialists can evaluate a large amount of information issued by the driver and the option to choose an alternate driver.

Snappy Driver, included in the distribution
DP_Biometric | Touchscreens
DP_Bluetooth | Bluetooth Devices
DP_CardReader | Card Readers
DP_Chipset | Chipsets
DP_LAN_Intel | Network cards Intel
DP_LAN_Others | Network cards Other
DP_LAN_Realtek-NT | Network cards Realtek (Win Vista-10)
DP_LAN_Realtek-XP | Network cards Realtek (Win XP)
DP_MassStorage | Controllers HDD / SSD
DP_Misc | Peripherals
DP_Modem | Modems
DP_Monitor | Monitors and projectors
DP_Printer | Printers
DP_Sound_ADI | Sound Cards and Sound Max ADI
DP_Sound_CMedia | Sound card C-Media
DP_Sound_Conexant | Sound card Conexant
DP_Sound_Creative | Sound cards Creative
DP_Sound_IDT | Sound Cards IDT and SigmaTel
DP_Sound_Others | Sound cards Other
DP_Sound_VIA | VIA Sound card
DP_Sounds_HDMI | HDMI audio devices
DP_Sounds_Realtek | Sound cards Realtek
DP_Telephone | Phones / Smartphones
DP_Touchpad_Alps | Touch-pads Alps
DP_Touchpad_Cypress | Touch-pads Cypress
DP_Touchpad_Elan | Touch-pads Elan
DP_Touchpad_Others | Touch-pads Other
DP_Touchpad_Synaptics | Synaptics touch-pads
DP_TV_Aver | Tuner Aver
DP_TV_Beholder | Tuner Beholder
DP_TV_DVB | Tuners and DVB devices
DP_TV_Others | Tuners other
DP_Vendor | The unique device-specific vendor
DP_Video_Intel-NT | Intel Graphics Card (Win Vista-10)
DP_Video_Intel-XP | Video Card Intel (Win XP)
DP_Video_nVIDIA_Server | Server nVidia graphics card
DP_Video_nVIDIA-NT | nVidia Graphics Cards (Win Vista-10)
DP_Video_nVIDIA-XP | Video Cards nVidia (Win XP)
DP_Videos_AMD_Server | AMD / ATI graphics cards Server
DP_Videos_AMD-NT | AMD / ATI Video Cards (Win Vista-10)
DP_Videos_AMD-XP | AMD / ATI Video Cards (Win XP)
DP_Videos_OEM | Video cards modified notebook manufacturers
DP_Videos_Others | other Graphics Cards
DP_WebCam | Web Camera
DP_WLAN-WiFi | Wi-Fi module and wireless device
DP_WWAN-4G | Modem / 3G / 4G / LTE device
DP_xUSB | USB Controllers
